description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. For some reason, Zombies have stolen your liquor and beamed it onto their space station. Use an arsenal of destructive weapons to fight the zombies and get it back!
description.short: For some reason, Zombies have stolen your liquor and beamed it onto their space station. Use an arsenal of destructive weapons to fight the zombies and get it back!
